ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities include implementing changes to pause playback when entering gameplay test from the editor, addressing an issue reported in https://github.com/ppy/osu/issues/312. There have also been efforts to enhance test reliability with failing assertions. These updates aim to improve the overall gameplay experience and stability.

ppy/s3-nginx-proxy.summary: The repository saw significant activity with a push event to preserve upstream Cache-Control headers, which is crucial for efficient caching and request handling. This change was implemented through a pull request, ensuring that the caching mechanism aligns with best practices for web performance and data freshness.
